  • havoc.autoval.tests.fio_fb.fio_fb

Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.fio_fb.fio_fb

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.fio.fio_runner import FioRunner



[docs]class FioFb(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(FioFb, self).__init__()
        self.files = self.test_control.get("files", None)
        self.filesystem = self.test_control.get("filesystem", None)
        self.replace_values = self.test_control.get("replace_values", None)
        self.drive_type = self.test_control.get("drive_type", None)
        self.drive_interface = self.test_control.get("drive_interface", None)
        self.drives = self.test_control.get("drives", None)
        self.template_file = self.test_control.get("template_file", "default_fio.job")



[docs]    def setup(self):
        super(FioFb, self).setup()
        self.hostname = self.host.hostname
        self.validate_no_exception(self.host.run, ["hostname"], "connected to host")
        self.host.oob.ping()
        self.validate_no_exception(
            self.host.oob.ping, [], "ping %s" % (self.host.hostname)
        )



[docs]    def execute(self):
        args = {
            "files": self.files,
            "filesystem": self.filesystem,
            "replace_values": self.replace_values,
            "drive_type": self.drive_type,
            "drive_interface": self.drive_interface,
            "drives": self.drives,
            "template_file": self.template_file,
        }
        fio = FioRunner(self.host, args)
        self.validate_no_exception(fio.test_setup, [], "Fio setup()")
        self.log_info("Starting fio to the DUT now")
        result, output_file = fio.start_test()
        self.validate_condition(result, "Ran fio on %s" % (output_file))
        results = fio.parse_results()
        self.result_handler.add_test_results(results)
        self.validate_condition(results, "Saved results for fio run")




[docs]def main():
    test = FioFb()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
